page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: One third of the area is covered with housing. Large council estates at { {Athersley}and {New Lodge}were built in the 1950's. Most of the housing are 2, 3 or 4 bedroom semi-detached, or bungalows for the elderly.{Mapplewell} is the oldest of the villages in the area, many of the houses around the centre of the village along the main roads are built of local sandstone. These terraced houses and cottages were built in the early 19th. century when {Mapplewell}was an important nail making centre. Many of the houses built after 1950 are brick built terrace houses built for the miners who worked at {North Gawber {colliery}. There are many modern building developments in the area at { {Staincross}where many privately owned houses and bungalows have been built.
